statements: SELECT name, location, capacity FROM concert_venues;
SELECT location, name, capacity FROM concert_venues;
SELECT capacity, name, location FROM concert_venues;
SELECT * FROM concert_venues WHERE location='New York';
SELECT name FROM concert_venues WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT * FROM concert_venues WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT name, capacity FROM concert_venues WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM concert_venues WHERE capacity > 5000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM concert_venues WHERE capacity BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT COUNT(name) AS venue_count FROM concert_venues GROUP BY location HAVING venue_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM concert_venue;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM concert_venue WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM concert_event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM concert_event WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT venue_id, name FROM concert_venue JOIN concert_event ON concert_venue.venue_id = concert_event.venue_id WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM concert_venue WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM concert_event WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT venue_id, name, location FROM concert_venue WHERE capacity BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM concert_event WHERE ticket_price > 50 AND event_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT venue_id, name, location, capacity FROM concert_venue WHERE name LIKE '%Arena%' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM concert_venues;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM concert_venues WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT performer_name, genre, popularity FROM performers WHERE popularity >= 80;
SELECT concert_id, date, ticket_price FROM concerts WHERE date >= '2022-09-01';

SELECT venue_name, performer_name, date, ticket_price FROM concert_venues JOIN concerts ON concert_venues.venue_id = concerts.venue_id JOIN performers ON concerts.performer_id = performers.performer_id;
SELECT * FROM concert_venues;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM concert_venues ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT performer_name, genre, popularity FROM performers WHERE popularity > 50 ORDER BY popularity DESC;
SELECT * FROM concerts WHERE ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT venue_name, performer_name, date, ticket_price FROM concert_venues JOIN concerts ON concert_venues.venue_id = concerts.venue_id JOIN performers ON concerts.performer_id = performers.performer_id;
SELECT * FROM venues;
SELECT id, name, location FROM venues WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT venue_id, COUNT(*) as total_performances FROM performances GROUP BY venue_id ORDER BY total_performances DESC;
SELECT * FROM venues ORDER BY name DESC, location ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_name LIKE '%a%';
SELECT venue_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM events GROUP BY venue_id HAVING total_events > 5;

SELECT v.name AS venue_name, e.event_name, a.artist_name FROM venues v INNER JOIN events e ON v.id = e.venue_id INNER JOIN performances p ON e.event_id = p.event_id INNER JOIN artists a ON p.artist_id = a.artist_id WHERE p.performance_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM concert_venues;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM concert_venues ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT event_date, ticket_price FROM concert_events WHERE ticket_price > 50.00;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop' OR genre = 'Rock';
SELECT name AS venue_name, location AS venue_location FROM concert_venues WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM concert_venues ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT venue_id, event_date, ticket_price FROM concert_events WHERE ticket_price > 50.00 ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY artist_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 30.00 ORDER BY ticket_type DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, attendee_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT 5;
